subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Lecture Demonstration Laboratory
author: RetroCom
full_text:
Yes, I have seen this for myself. If you put a small 'tea' candle in the well of an ultrasonic cleaner light the candle and switch on, the flame reacts violently. If you record the flame with a phototransistor some voices can be heard along with noise from the ultrasonic cleaner.
